description:
Elon Musk’s startup xAI has made its large language model Grok available as open source software. The 314 billion parameter model can now be freely accessed, modified, and distributed by anyone under an Apache 2.0 license. The release fulfils Musk’s promise to open source Grok in an effort to accelerate AI development and adoption. XAI... Read more »

The post Elon Musk’s xAI open-sources Grok appeared first on AI News.
title: Elon Musk’s xAI open-sources Grok
